#### Welcome!

I'm a postdoctoral research fellow at the Department of Demography of the [University of Vienna](https://ufind.univie.ac.at/en/person.html?id=115424)- [Wittgenstein Centre](http://www.wittgensteincentre.org/en/staff/member/compans.htm). I work mainly on (late) fertility and assisted reproduction in Europe, and I'm currently part of the [BIC.Late project](https://biclate.univie.ac.at/).

## Experience

**Postdoctoral research fellow**, University of Vienna - Wittgenstein Centre \| Oct. 2021 - Present

**Ph.D. Candidate**, French National Institute for Demographic Studies (Ined) \| Sept. 2017 - June 2021
